text: Yest' i drugiye lyudi, kotoryye prichinyali tebe (o Mukhammad!) i veruyushchim vred, no zatem priznalis' v svoikh grekhakh i poshli pravednym putom Allakha. Eti sovershali dobryye i zlyye dela, poetomu, mozhet byt', Allakh prostit ikh, poskol'ku oni pokayalis'. Poistine, Allakh miloserden k Svoim rabam! On obrashchayet Svoy vzor k Svoim rabam, kotoryye kayutsya, i proshchayet ikh
